mapper.update: update STEPFILE set SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FN = #{fn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TP = #{tp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIZ = #{siz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIM = #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, TXT = #{txt,jdbcType=BLOB} where SFID = #{sfid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SFID, SID, PID, FN, TP, SIZ, TIM, TXT from STEPFILE
